snippet: The House has passed legislation to speed government contracts to modernize the aging fleet of tanker planes that dump suppressants on Western wildfires.
abstract: House passes legislation to speed government contracts to modernize the aging fleet of tanker planes that dump suppressants on Western wildfires.
lead_paragraph: The House has passed legislation to speed government contracts to modernize the aging fleet of tanker planes that dump suppressants on Western wildfires.

headline.seo: Congress Moves To Expedite Firefighting Tankers
headline.main: Congress Moves to Expedite Firefighting Tankers
headline.print_headline: Congress Moves To Expedite Firefighting Tankers
